page.description: Fires before an Ajax callback. If the function returns false, the callback will be aborted.

argument.name: e
argument.description: An object with the following properties:

property.name: XbasicFunctionName
property.description: The Xbasic function that was called in the Ajax Callback.

property.name: ajaxEvent
property.description: The name of the event that triggered the Ajax Callback.

property.name: callbackId
property.description: A GUID that identifiees the callback, allowing you to match it in the [afterAjaxCallbackComplete] event for a specific callback.
